data.title: Lecon Inaugurale, faite le Vendredi 7 Mai 1965, College de France, Chaire de Genetique Cellulaire
data.meta_description: Paris : College de France, 1965. First printing. Paperback. 8vo, wraps, very good sharp copy, ownership signature on front cover of Robert Olby, a geneticist and historian of 19th and 20th century biology. 33 pp. Uncommon in the trade. Jacob was one of three recipients of the Nobel Prize in Medicine in 1965, sharing the award with Jacques Monod and Andre Lwoff. Very Good. Item #H20541
